website_summaries.verdict: A great faux wood style blind at an attractive price point, users are impressed with its heavy-duty construction and accurate sizing.
pros: Solid metal channel is a plus, resisting damage
Most users feel the blinds are good quality for the price
cons: Some users report that raising the blinds isn’t as smooth as they’d like
No spare hardware in case of broken parts
A few reports of damaged slats on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like real wood
customer_reviews.text: These faux wood blinds are ok, but not sure they are worth the $. If you don't plan on raising the blinds, they would be ok, but they are a pain to raise up and lower back down because the cords don't pull smoothly. The bottom is never quite level when hanging, and I end up pulling on the blinds to get them back down. They don't look like wood blinds, just smooth vinyl. Also be sure to measure the top of your window where the blinds will hang because it may not be the same size as the bottom of the window.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for low price.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kitchen window and it is perfect. Our window is literally right at the edge of where the wall and ceiling meet so we had to install the brackets on the ceiling which was a pain during install. I would for sure buy these again for another window where we wouldn’t have that problem. Following install, we have not had any issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This blind was unexpectedly great quality for the inexpensive price. It looks great, operates smoothly and is easy to clean. Update: Have had this blind for 6 months now and still love it! We do not raise and lower it that much, but do use the mechanism to open and close the slats several times a day and have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie5678

customer_reviews.title: ... price and quality except for one thing - the horrible screws included
customer_reviews.text: This would be five stars for price and quality except for one thing - the horrible screws included. They are not phillips, so very difficult to screw in - plus the heads are very thick, so if you have a tight fit (my window is 28.5), the screw heads actually keep you from installing the blinds. I ended up substituted some phillips head screws I had. That said, these are really nice blinds with real wood header and bottom rail. Much better than blinds I paid three times as much for. Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. All 3 look used and dirty. Huge dents in them. Nothing properly wraled for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MikeLee

customer_reviews.title: I was given the wrong size...now I am stuck with it..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 71.5 x 36, but I got 46.5 x 36. It was double boxed and the outside box was big enough to look right, but after I opened that big box to put up the new blinds in my finally remodeled room, there was a smaller box inside. I don’t have any windows this size, neither do my friends, and it’s too late to return them. Plus I paid for the 71.5 as well, so I am pretty ticked off with this purchase right now!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: FITS exactly as described ( i was hoping it would be about 2/8 smaller, as many blinds are a little shorter than described), however this was the exact length it said on the product page. I managed to get it to fit, but it was work! The only complaint is one of the plastic clip that holds the trim broke during installation without much force.
customer_reviews.author: N.N

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and fits as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Recently upgraded all of the blinds in my bedrooms and chose this brand. The installation was mostly easy, and the instructions are simple enough. After installing the first one, the others took even less time. They look nice and function as expected. Finally no more cheap 1” blinds in various states of brokenness.
customer_reviews.author: DragonRules

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blind. So glad I waited as it took ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful blind. So glad I waited as it took a longer to receive it. It went up pretty easily and looks very professional. I especially like that it is smooth faux wood rather than the texture as it is much easier to keep clean. I also like how easy it is to just pull a string to open and close rather than to keep turning a wand. Older hands find this a relief! I'll probably order a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Terry N.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate!  Buy these blinds from US Floor & Window.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality...better than a well known name brand sold at the local home improvement store. My husband and I wish we had known about US Window & Floor a year ago when we purchased blinds for other windows in our new home. This company sent extra hardware and our son easily put this blind up in less than 10 minutes. We are highly satisfied customers especially since this blind was a third of the price we would have paid if we bought locally.
customer_reviews.author: Beth J. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap but that is exactly why they are basically coming apart at the seams or bending of you are not careful when installing them. Flimsy aluminium that a child can bend. Overall is ok for what I am using them but should be cheaper considering the materials used and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: I would never purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Ordered two blinds, paid for two, only received one, and that was shorter than it was supposed to be. Contacted the company. It has now been almost three months, and numerous phone calls, yet no resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick & Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, I have these all throughout my house and they all look and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Business

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect on my window
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect on my window, Was easy to install except for parts of my walls were extremely difficult to drill through but that was an issue with the walls not at all with this item. Im extremely impressed with the quality and sturdiness of this item and most of all with the price.
customer_reviews.author: daniella ospina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blind
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical due to the low price so I only bought one to replace my kitchen blind. It is great! It's easy to install - same as any similar type of blind. It looks great - looks better than the faux wood blinds I previously bought at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: RunningBrave

customer_reviews.title: Good blinds
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these window blinds.They are easy to install and does a good job of shadeing your inner house from the sun.The price was right and I got free shipping with my prime account. I believe this is a deal that you will like if you need window covers for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Locklear

customer_reviews.title: Measure extra carefully
customer_reviews.text: Watch your measurements! I was off by the tiniest bit. and had to hang them on the outside of the window frame. But they look great and work well. So that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: eieio

customer_reviews.title: Sub-par
customer_reviews.text: Package looks to be a return. No installation hardware or instructions. VERY DISAPPOINTING!!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace the blinds in my bathroom. They were super easy to install and came with a nice headliner to hide the hardware which actually matched the new baseboard we had just installed. Nice surprise and not expected for the price. I will be buying this brand as I replace all the blinds in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived and faulty c
customer_reviews.text: The blinds were damaged and not from shipping. One of the angle adjustment cords was broken. It was repaired, but not as good as new and too much trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my kitchen window
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my kitchen window...i need it for privacy but pull it up and out of view during the day. Excellent quality...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I like the valence that came with them and the fact that there is not a wand to get in the way when I tilt in the windows to clean them
customer_reviews.author: B. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Loved these blinds for the first year
customer_reviews.text: Loved these blinds for the first year, now the one end of the blind will not stay up. Pull blind up and slowly the one end will fall down....everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne V

customer_reviews.title: window blinds
customer_reviews.text: I really like the blinds. They look great. It is very important to measure correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This product is not 46inch like stated but 47.5 inch. Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cole

customer_reviews.title: Love them. I measured them and took off 1/4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I put these up on all of my windows. Love them. I measured them and took off 1/4 of an inch. If I didn't they wouldn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was very nice. I did have to return to because of ...
customer_reviews.text: Was very nice. I did have to return to because of my fault! But I was very upset because they were so nice for the price
customer_reviews.author: jordan kirk

customer_reviews.title: Creeper Declutterer
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome at keeping the creepers out of your life! And surging a temper tantrum throwing entitled four year old.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Measure !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure your window . The eights of an inch matter !!! If your window measures to the exact 1/8inch buy the size 1/8 inch smaller . You won’t notice and install is way better .
customer_reviews.author: Juston Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and made built really well
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on a 36” x 36” window. Looks great and is made really well. Not a cheapo! It’s identical to the expensive ones from big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: I have several of this type around the house and they are very nice. Easy to install (use a socket instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed these to replace my old blinds in my bathroom. I have several of this type around the house and they are very nice. Easy to install (use a socket instead of a flathead).
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: In every way perfect, ordering shipping, quality installation perfect exactly what we wanted and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: AAFlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: very well made would recommend to anyone for future
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, very well made would recommend to anyone for future. Will be buying more for other rooms as we remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made! Amazing blinds!
customer_reviews.text: Best blinds I’ve ever purchased! Super sturdy and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: angeleyes81882

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blinds
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality to cover up a bathroom window.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Harrison

customer_reviews.title: This item had previously been returned and should not have been sent back out.
customer_reviews.text: This item came as it had already been opened and returned by someone else! Bended edges strings out of order we're currently trying to install what we have cuz we don't want to return it what a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have white windows and the blinds look dingy in comparison. Not a bright white.
customer_reviews.author: E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works in az!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I ordered the wrong length.....measure the length too people!!!! But I put them in my kitchen instead, its 115 outside and my window is west, so ide say these are fantastic for the price! Hope the sun don't dry rot it in the future! Blocks heat and sun!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect fit and the perfect price
customer_reviews.text: We could never find the right kind of blinds until we found these ones! They are the perfect fit and the perfect price! Would definitely recommend them too all of you who have a weird shaped window!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and made very well.. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Larry R

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works fine in my window space, but is a little longer than I requested.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Easy to install and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Easy to install and looks great. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: novmama

customer_reviews.title: Was not accurately sized
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 and got 2 seperate sizes. Think I can make it work in another room in the house, but had to order another blind to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Frink

customer_reviews.title: We were going to get curtains or the room but once we put the blinds up decided it looked great already!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning once on a window. We were going to get curtains or the room but once we put the blinds up decided it looked great already!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install.Wish my living room blinds had the draw string.
customer_reviews.author: MTB

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and priced right.I have some faux blinds in other areas and paid a whole lot more.only wish there was a color option
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Nice blinds for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice blinds for the price! Half the price as the others I looked at, these are shorter though. They fit my windows perfectly but be sure to measure length and width before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay g.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a perfect fit for my home windows
customer_reviews.author: Olubunmi Adewalure

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, love the way it looks on window. Very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE

customer_reviews.title: Blinds bend in center due to lack of shipping efforts.
customer_reviews.text: Received with blinds bent in the middle due to lack of support.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds for the price however...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why they give you the hardware they do. The flathead screws are worthless. Do yourself a favor and use flat top, Phillips wood screws. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: Used in a bathroom window. Installation was easy and blinds fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The animals haven't broke them yet so they're great by my standards!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: We have a variety of brands of faux wood blinds in our house (including Levelor and Better Homes & Gardens), and even though these were the cheapest in price, they are definitely our favorite. Unlike other reviewers, I haven't noticed the pull mechanisms to be any different than those on our other brands. Also, the width of the decorative piece that snaps on over the hardware gives the blinds an expensive looking touch. A note about sizing: The width of our window openings is exactly 36". We ordered the 35 5/8" blinds. They were a tight fit, but they fit nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Nate & Monica

customer_reviews.title: Wood blinds were great in the spot need
customer_reviews.text: Wood blinds were great in the spot need. Wish I would have read the length a little better, they were about 6 inches too short. However, they work for my 6 year olds bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Gray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: blinds met all my expectations,plus delivery was right on time,as always!
customer_reviews.author: faye a.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality and easy to install! they look great- highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: SFC US ARMY

customer_reviews.title: Great Blinds
customer_reviews.text: Blinds are great, I need mounting brackets as I misplaced them. How can I order them ?
customer_reviews.author: Flora Turman

customer_reviews.title: No hardware included
customer_reviews.text: The blinds are as expected, unfortunately they came with no hardware, even though the packaging states hardware included. My husband now has to look for these at another hardware store, since we already removed the old roller blinds.
customer_reviews.author: BuddyDW

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: When I try to let blinds down one side always gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product has good quality. This is the best deal you could ...
customer_reviews.text: Product has good quality. This is the best deal you could find for faux wood blinds. However one blind came in with one string broke which makes pulling up the blind difficult. I'm looking for warranty contact but couldn't find whom to contact...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They don't close tightly together, letting a lot of light in. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Did not like these blinds
customer_reviews.text: Did not like these blinds. They were extremely heavy. I didn't think the window could hold them up. They scratched very easily. The top part is made of aluminum? I don't know but I didn't like that and that valance came with a dirt smudge. I returned these and they were taken back without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: takeisha

customer_reviews.title: Much more difficult to install than expected. Had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Much more difficult to install than expected. Had to go out and buy smaller screws because the head on the ones it came with were interfering with placing the blind in. Once finally installed (90 minutes later) I realized they were too short. Take not: 36" height! Only half a window. Makes sense why they were so cheap now.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: was SO Short. i've never bought blinds that didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: was SO Short. i've never bought blinds that didn't have a ton of extra at the bottom. This doesn't cover my whole window :-(
customer_reviews.author: Lv

customer_reviews.title: My windows will not accept these blinds on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: My windows will not accept these blinds on the inside. I will have to return them. I can pay my own freight but the site only gives choices to send back and have the freight deducted from the credit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but unless you raise and lower constantly these should work great for you
customer_reviews.text: Half the price of the big box stores for nearly same product. Can telll in the raising/lowering action that it is not as smooth as the more expensive options, but unless you raise and lower constantly these should work great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff/Sarah

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY + PRICE = AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Having installed the home depot/lowes blinds throughout my home, this product is simply the BEST. As soon as I took the product out of the box, I can immediately tell the quality difference between this and the more expensive big box versions. I only wish i knew about this a year or two ago. And the best is they are made to size, no cutting/adjusting. PERFECT. Need QUALITY blinds for a great price, this is it
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for our kitchen window and positively love them. They are very classy looking, nice finish trim on top. i also like that they are made of like pvc material allowing us to just barely shave down where tile insets are in our window leaving a still very nice white end on our blinds. i love them so much that i just was looking to see if i could buy four more for my living room window... sadly they don't have the width we need but i would absolutely buy them again.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and expensive looking!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE BLINDS!!! Love the look, the ease of installation, the quick response regarding a question from the company, bit most of all, the price! They look every bit as nice as the same style blinds i ordered from a famous blinds and wallpaper company...at less than half the cost. My. Husband put 2 blinds up in about 10 minutes. I am so happy that I went with these!!
customer_reviews.author: fabgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blinds for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price. The header is metal and very solid so you done have to worry about sagging in the middle. Easy to install and the valance is nice looking. Not crazy about the turning pull cords, they work fine but prefer the rod type. This look good and work well. True to size for proper installation. Fast delivery too. I use these inside the window, so not great at cutting all the light out, but didn't need that.
customer_reviews.author: F. Figueroa Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds, look excellent in the house
customer_reviews.text: Love these blinds! Look so much better in the house with these blinds. The top valance is nice too, so blinds match door frames. I initially just bought one for a door and liked it a lot, so I've purchased more for most of the house. Easy to install, just make sure you have a drill bit that fits the provided screw well, otherwise you're going to be using a screwdriver and it can be tough then.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Look Great and Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship is just fine. Looks great and works great! I paid around $25-$27 for this, which I believe was a very good price compared to everywhere else I looked. I removed most of the slats because I only needed it to cover a window area that was only about 2 feet high. It was easy to remove the unneeded slats and re-secure the bottom one (after watching a youtube or two on how to do it). The blind pulls up cleanly and smartly, and the two drawstrings on the left turn the slats up and down very smoothly. I highly recommend for the quality/price ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Brianmellow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and value. I love this blind; it immediately updated my small powder room. The valance is especially nice and dresses up the entire blind. The blind raises and lowers easily. Highly recommend; much nicer than I saw at the "big box" home stores for less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cessie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with new blinds.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed them. They look very nice and look to be good quality. If not for the fact that I had to perform a minor adjustment to the open/close blind actuator (the metal rotary mechanism on top wasn't straight causing them to bind when opening and closing. Both I bought had the exact same issue)I would have given it 5 Star. For the price, which was $20 cheaper each than those at Home Depot, you can't beat it. Would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE R.

customer_reviews.title: Great! But get your own screws!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with these blinds!! I ordered an open package through the amazon fufulllment center, and I was no disappointed. The only thing that could be better with this product is the quality of the screws, they suck and two broke on me, which was a major hassle. I ended up upgrading the screws for easy install. Would give 5 stars if not for cheap screws!
customer_reviews.author: Luckylotery

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise !!
customer_reviews.text: Totally and pleasant surprised. Very good heavy duty quality and extremely easy to install. O.K. they are made in China but most of the stuff is nowadays.They look and feel like much more expensive store brands. We already placed the second order for different sizes.One complaint ..two of the plastic holders for the valance were broken and no spares like somebody else wrote. Luckily the third one manages to hold the valance alone. Recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: KL Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Good Value & Light Blocking
customer_reviews.text: Nice blind for the price and I like that it doesn't have the wand for moving the slats. They always seem to break somehow. The thicker slats block more light than the 1" mini blind and the top trim rail looks really nice. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: suziq88

customer_reviews.title: No more wasted time at the home store!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at similar blinds in several home stores and they never had the size I needed for a small bathroom window. I thought "Why the heck haven't I checked Amazon?" Less expensive, nicer quality blinds and Amazon shipping. These blinds are quality made, look great and are easy to install. For the money I think they'd be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: ... nicer than the basic vinyl blinds are were very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These blinds are SO much nicer than the basic vinyl blinds are were very easy to install. I was impressed with the quality of everything, including the mounting brackets. Great value, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ariz_Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: It was well made
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return it as it was too long for the inside of window. Measure twice cut once did not work here. Have different measurements but can’t find this blind in the size I need.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  Washel

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these thinking they were the same as the rest of the blinds in my house but they are a little lower quality. They were very easy to hang and look very nice, but the resistance when pulling the blinds up was not as smooth as I expected and made a sound akin to nails on a chalkboard. This is coming from a very particular person, i still think they are a good product for a good price and get 4 of 5 from me
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Valance cut too short
customer_reviews.text: The valance that was included is not long enough to cover the headrail. Negligence on part of manufacturer and looks ridiculous not covering the length of headrail. I will reach out to get a replacement valance the appropriate size!
customer_reviews.author: kansas sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, would rather them be a cleanable texture.
customer_reviews.text: These are a good quality blind. I feel like they will probably be easy to get dirty because they feel like flat paint. But hoping they stay clean for the long haul. Easy to install and I like the extra faux trim at the top!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase of this brand I made. Love the blinds. Great quality and cost.
customer_reviews.author: StaticScribble

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blinds! Missing a hold down cleat called the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blinds! Missing a hold down cleat called the manufacturer and ordered a replacement. Been a month and it hasn't came.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: They are built so strong love them.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are so very worth it. They are built so strong love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I did get around to installing them until today after ...
customer_reviews.text: I did get around to installing them until today after the return window closed of course , The brackets to install blinds are the wrong size and I cannot install the blinds and they came with a dent even thought they where a box in a box it should not be dented
customer_reviews.author: TDS

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure these are nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these are really nice. But of course I ordered them too short and never opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed of the quality of this product. This same product was 48.00 at Lowe’s or Home Depot. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy blinds
customer_reviews.text: They are nice blinds shorter then I thought they would be but that was on me. Sturdy and work great.
customer_reviews.author: eydie

customer_reviews.title: Faux crown molding valance was damaged on one end, ...
customer_reviews.text: Faux crown molding valance was damaged on one end, which is why I gave 3 stars. However, all parts were included and no other issues
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Mc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Was easy to install. On par with Levlor blinds without having to be custom cut.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Blinded
customer_reviews.text: Good price for some good blinds. I installed these quickly in my bathroom window and they block all visibility from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Cory S

customer_reviews.title: Great and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great and great price. I tried not to write reviews that don't add to what has already been said, so I would just add this: I found that it would be easier to put the wood façade in the plastic hooks first, then put the hooks on the rail and then slide the rail in place. If you put the hooks on the rail first, slide it in place, then you will have to ram the wood façade on the plastic hooks and they are a bit flimsy so they will break easily. Also notice though the looks are symmetric, there is a front and back (look at the cords and that will tell you how it should go in).
customer_reviews.author: DiosmayaTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Very good, sturdy blinds
customer_reviews.text: Very good, sturdy blinds. Very easy to pull up and down. I had a part bent when it arrived. I contacted the company and got a reply very quickly and they sent me new parts immediately. Nice people to communicate with. Will buy again.

product_meta.title: US Window And Floor 2" Faux Wood Blind, Inside-Mount, 46 5/8" W X 36" H, White
product_meta.description: Size:46 5/8" X 36"The size above is the size of the blind. Before placing order, please measure your window opening. To ensure that the blind fits inside the window frame, the width of the opening must be 1/2 inch larger than the width of the blind that you purchase. For the blind to be flush with the window frame, the opening must be at least 3 inch deep. Our blinds are crafted with high quality components including high profile steel head rails, quality PVC foam slats, wood tassels, and solid trapezoid bottom rails. Our blinds resist heat and humidity, and are great for all areas including the kitchen, laundry room, and bathroom. Mounting hardware; clips, screws, and brackets, are included in the box. An inside-mount valance without returns is also included.
feature_bullets: For blind size above, window opening needs to be 1/2" wider for correct fit. For flush mount, an opening must be 3 inch inches deep.

2 inch flat PVC foam slat with high profile steel head rail with beautiful inside-mount valance to cover the front of the steel headrail. The valance size is 3 1/4" without valance returns. Premium Wood Tassels with solid Trapezoid PVC bottom rail.
Tilter cords on the left. Lift cords on the Right.
Actual blind width is 46 5/8 inch. Fits a window opening 47 1/8 to 47 1/4 inch wide
Installation instruction and mounting hardware included. To download the installation instruction, please see under Technical Specification.
